name: I Will Help You (Prototype)
description: The goal of the project is to soothe the feeling of loneliness and distress caused by the sudden change in our daily lives due to the social distancing and self-isolation rules in place because of the current COVID-19 pandemic through a digital game that will provide a personalized experience to players. Upon finding a character with features prone to personal acknowledgment, the player will experience feelings of empathy and peace of mind. Through this feeling, the game will allow individuals in isolation to express as well as recognize their feelings in a way that stimulates self-care and introspection as a response to the emotional challenges they face nowadays due to the pandemic. The project’s intent is to urge people to find comfort and strength within themselves.
